description: A combination of new and old, the Hudson 5 waterproof boots blend waterproof leather with Kamik’s ultralight RubberHe. The rugged leather uppers have a comfortable flex, wear well and are waterproof. The light and flexible RubberHe lower and outsole offer all-day support and great grip. Waterproof construction ensures that your feet will stay dry as you navigate snowdrifts and slushy puddles.Handsome waterproof leather uppers.Soft fleecy lining helps wick way moisture and keeps you cozy and warm.200 grams of Thinsulate™ synthetic insulation is light and efficient.Lightweight synthetic RubberHe shell and outsole is PVC-free, waterproof, durable and recyclable.RubberHe is rated to 1,000,000 flexes and is unaffected by weather down to -32°C, offering excellent traction in any weather.
name: Kamik Hudson 5 Waterproof Insulated Boots - Men's
